name: Blue Man and the Void
description:
This painting was created in Berlin around April 2021, while the world was still experiencing pandemic lockdown. Being alone, in a home, during this pandemic invoked many emotions. Above all else, it made individuals come face-to-face with another virus, that of loneliness. 

For me, Blue Man embodies the loneliness that I faced. It has given me the ability to look back at the those dispirited days to appreciate both the melancholy and beauty that came about during those months. Without gloomy days we would not be able to recognize the awe of sunny days.
